text: The 1950 New York Giants season was the franchise's 68th season. The team finished in third place in the National League with an 86-68 record, 5 games behind the Philadelphia Phillies. == Offseason == * December 14, 1949: Sid Gordon, Buddy Kerr, Willard Marshall, and Red Webb were traded by the Giants to the Boston Braves for Eddie Stanky and Alvin Dark.Eddie Stanky at Baseball Reference * Prior to 1950 season: Al Sima was purchased from the Giants by the Washington Senators.Al Sima at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Opening Day lineup === === Notable transactions === * June 20, 1950: Willie Mays was signed as an amateur free agent by the Giants.Willie Mays at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
